lines.text: set s to size of T
a = int array of size s
set all values of a to T [ i ] - ' a '
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < s ; ++ i ) { a [ i ] = ( T [ i ] - ' a ' ) ; }

lines.text: loop while ind is greater or equal to 0
for i = 0 to s print the char at position a [ i ] of " abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz "
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < s ; ++ i ) cout << " abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz " [ a [ i ] ] ;

lines.text: for a [ ind ] = a [ ind ] + 1 to p
lines.code: for ( a [ ind ] = a [ ind ] + 1 ; a [ ind ] < p ; ++ a [ ind ] )

lines.text: if ( ind is greater or equal to 1 and a [ ind ] is a [ ind - 1 ] or ind is greater or equal to 2 and a [ ind ] is a [ ind - 2 ] ) is false then break

lines.text: set a [ ind ] to - 1 then decrement ind
